sentences.en: Although he was apparently drowned, resuscitation was accomplished by artificial respiration.
sentences.cn: 虽然他表面上被淹死了, 但是在经过人工呼吸后成功地恢复了呼吸.

sentences.en: And this is very important today for the resuscitation of religious values.
sentences.cn: 这在今天对于宗教价值的复兴来说是十分重要的.

sentences.en: Cardiopulmonary resuscitation or CPR is helped for a stopped heart.
sentences.cn: 心肺腹或者CPR是用来帮助停止跳动的心脏.

sentences.en: Continue resuscitation until the person starts breathing and then place them in the recovery position.
sentences.cn: 持续复苏术直到病人开始呼吸,然后使其保持复原姿势.

sentences.en: Despite attempts at resuscitation, Mr Lynch died a week later in hospital.
sentences.cn: 虽经全力抢救，但林奇先生一周以后还是在医院去世了。

sentences.en: Hypertonic Saline Resuscitation : Efficacy May Require Early Treatment in Seerely Injured Patients.
sentences.cn: 高渗盐液复苏: 对严重创伤患者治疗宜早.

sentences.en: If the child does not respond, start cardiopulmonary resuscitation ( CPR ).
sentences.cn: 如无反应, 开始心肺复苏.

sentences.en: Milrinone combined with vasopressin improves cardiac index after cardiopulmonary resuscitation in a pig model of myocardial infarction.
sentences.cn: 米力龙复合抗利尿激素增加心肌梗塞模型猪的心肺复苏后心脏指数。

sentences.en: Molly: Stand back, now I must give mouth to mouth resuscitation.
sentences.cn: 莫莉: 靠后站, 现在我必须做嘴对嘴的复苏术.

sentences.en: Objective : To evaluate the effect of the programmed resuscitation in CPR.
sentences.cn: 目的: 探讨程序化复苏在心肺复苏(Cardiopulmonaryresuscitation,CPR) 中的应用效果.

sentences.en: Objective To study the effect of administrating vasopressin on cardiopulmonary resuscitation.
sentences.cn: 目的研究垂体后叶素在心肺复苏中的作用.

sentences.en: Resourcitation Cardiopulmonary resuscitation , or CPR , is help for a stop stopped heart.
sentences.cn: 心肺复生, 简称CPR, 是对已停止跳动的心脏的恢复.

sentences.en: The best way to do this is by mouth - to - mouth resuscitation.
sentences.cn: 最好的方法就是嘴对嘴救生法.

sentences.en: The lifeguard used mouth - to - mouth resuscitation to save the child's life.
sentences.cn: 救护员使用了口对口人工呼吸法来挽救那孩子的生命.

sentences.en: This paper introduces the control system of a novel double - pump resuscitation ( DPR ) instrument.
sentences.cn: 本文介绍一种新型双泵复苏装置的控制系统.

words.tran_cn: 使复活的人；人工呼吸器
